name: Target Practice (itch) (Blake Hewitt)
description:
A small game originally created for a university assignment, that has been tweaked and improved. 

While controlling the target, catch regular arrows and bundled arrows to increase your score. Avoid damaged arrows as they will lower your score. If you collide with a bomb, it's game over!

As your score increases, so does the speed of the arrows!

Assets are a combination of self-made, freely available and some icons were created by BlossomReady (Twitter handle: @BlossomReady).
